name: Consumer Request Process
description: Documented procedure for receiving authenticating and responding to consumer rights requests within 45 days

name: Consumer Authentication
description: Commercially reasonable authentication method to verify consumer identity for access requests

name: Access Request Response Template
description: Standard template and workflow for providing access to personal data in portable format

name: Correction Request Process
description: Documented procedure for accepting correcting and confirming corrections to personal data

name: Deletion Request Process
description: Documented procedure for receiving and executing deletion requests including notification to service providers

name: Data Portability Format
description: Specification for portable usable format to transmit personal data upon consumer request

name: Opt-Out Request Tracking
description: System and procedures to track honor and document opt-out requests for targeted advertising sale and profiling

name: Appeal Handling Process
description: Documented procedure for receiving and adjudicating consumer appeals of controller refusal to act

name: Consent Capture Mechanism
description: Technical specification for capturing storing and managing affirmative consent for sensitive data processing

name: Data Minimization Audit
description: Quarterly audit procedure to verify personal data collection is adequate relevant and necessary

name: Security Practices Assessment
description: Annual assessment and documentation of administrative technical and physical security safeguards

name: Privacy Notice Template
description: Standard template for clear accessible meaningful privacy notices describing processing practices

name: Opt-Out Disclosure Mechanism
description: Technical specification for disclosing sale and targeted advertising with easy opt-out option

name: Processor Agreement Template
description: Standard data processing agreement containing required statutory obligations and duties

name: Data Protection Assessment Template
description: Standard template and process for conducting documenting DPA for sale of personal data

name: DPA for Sensitive Data Processing
description: Specific DPA procedure and template for sensitive data processing activities

name: DPA for Targeted Advertising
description: DPA procedure for targeted advertising and profiling activities

name: DPA for Heightened-Risk Processing
description: DPA procedure for heightened-risk processing activities

name: De-identification Standard
description: Technical specification and procedures for de-identifying data per NIST standards

name: Re-identification Commitment
description: Public commitment and binding controls to prevent re-identification of de-identified data
